vulnerability.name: CVE-2024-1234
vulnerability.description: Example SQL injection vulnerability in authentication module

statements.impact_statement: The vulnerable authentication module is not used in our application. We use a different authentication provider.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2024-5678
vulnerability.description: Remote code execution in file upload handler

statements.action_statement: Upgrade to version 2.1.0 which includes the security patch. The fix will be deployed in the next maintenance window on 2025-01-20.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2024-9012
vulnerability.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in comment rendering

statements.status_notes: Patched in version 3.4.1 released on 2025-01-10. All systems updated as of 2025-01-12.

vulnerability.name: CVE-2024-3456
vulnerability.description: Potential denial of service in XML parser

statements.status_notes: Currently analyzing impact on our specific use case. Initial assessment suggests low risk but verification ongoing.
